belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ24
overview: The 24th series that introduces the mysterious phenomenon reflected in the home video of ordinary households and the psyche that was mixed in with the surveillance camera !! "Sobbing" Many stone monuments are lined up at the entrance of the pitch-black shrine. In the past, murders have occurred in this place, and it is said that the spirits of victims sobbing at night will appear.
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video Vol.24
